name: reximdai
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wi(w1, w2)), wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, w2)))
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w2)))

comment: Deduction from Theorem 19.22 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Restricted quantifier version.) (Contributed by NM, 31-Aug-1999.)
